So apparently they don't honor the check in desert redeem anymore , yet it's still up and available to activate. Gosh it's annoying when places so that.Burger and fries were ok, nothing to go out of your way to have. Shake was too watery even when told it was " thick" by the waitress.Be real though, you come here to watch a game and have junk food and beer. They do that well at least.
